title: A suit!  And a Dunk Tank!
body:
Last week we had an all-hands meeting of the Java & Tools folks at Sun. Just to freak everyone out I actually wore a suit, for the first time since the US v Microsoft trial. We also got a bunch of people (including me) to volunteer for a dunk tank. This is a picture of me, in suit, just before I dropped into the water. The suit was wool, and it was a hot day. I was really looking forward to getting dunked. If anyone has a picture of me falling into the water, please send me a copy.

Thanks to Alan Monday for this picture.
